Name: Illusion 幻覚
About the game: Delivery personnel headed to a condominium building to deliver a package. The delivery personnel completes the delivery but realizes he cannot leave the condominium building. As he explores the building, he finds out shocking truths. This is an exploratory, third-person horror game. Playtime 30 to 90 minutes Save The content will be saved automatically. Low-load setting Settings for low-load gaming are available to allow you to play on computers that do not meet the recommended specifications. This game was developed using Unreal Engine 5. It is recommended that you update your graphics card to the latest version whenever possible. Whether you are an individual or a corporation, you are allowed to play the game live, stream it, or gain profit in conjunction therewith.
